title: DEKA Trading Corp. Recalls Ineligible Ready-To-Eat Pork Rind Products Imported from Guatemala
summary: EDITOR'S NOTE: June 29, 2023 - This recall release is being reissued to include additional products. One new product is included below that FSIS identified during the course of recall effectiveness checks. This release has been updated to include the new product, additional labels, and...
impacted_products: •	5.3 oz. (150g) foil pouch packages containing “TorTrix Con Chicharrón.”
•	2.8 oz. (80g) foil pouch packages containing  “Señorial Tortillitas MIX CON CHICHARRONES.”
